page.title: 13THE RIVER TEES
page.content:
The river that runs through our area is called the Tees.It is a fast flowing river with pools and rapids.On its banks are boulders,shingle, limestone,sandstone and whinstone washed down from upstream.There is a limestone gorge to the east of our area near Abbey Bridge.There are five disused{mills,} one is in ruins and another is used temporarily as a book shop.The others are homes.The trees growing by the river include Ash,Alder ,Sycamore and Elm.Many of the Elms are suffering from{Dutch Elm Disease.}Lots of the fields are full of flowers such as buttercups,hedge parsley.Hawthorn bushes and Blackthorn bushes are common.
_
